name: THE FIVE CURSES
description:
idea of the game : In the game a demon will challenge you and you will accept the challenge and you will go to a strange world to collect crystal but in each level you will have a different curse if you collect the required number then you will win And the devil will set you free HOW TO PLAY :

                                                      -    Use [a] [d] or

                                                          left and right

                                                         arrow to move

                                                   -     Use [space]  or

                                                                     up

                                                         arrow to jump

                                                     -     Use  [Shift] to

                                                                sprint

INFORMATION :

- This is a game created with Godot 3.5.1 . It was developed specifically for Godot Wild Jam #54 with the theme : " curses "

- This was my first time participating in a game jam 

NOTE :

To fully experience the game, we recommend playing in full-screen mode, which will allow you to see the whole game view .

Takes about 5 to 15 minutes to complete the whole game.
